resources.string: Are you sure you want to logout?
TOGETHER - WE CAN MAKE IT BETTER!

BeSocial application is a new social media application. Our main goal was to inspire and encourage you to be more active in society, help each other, make new connections, volunteer more and just to have fun. We would like to inform you that this app was made in great efforts, so we hope you appriciate, keep the rules and behave well. This application will only be used for peace purposes. Thank you for the understanding and have a pleasant use.
Home page- home contains users posts. You may create your own posts using the plus button at the top of the page. \nRemember that posts that will contain offensive words will NOT be published.

Notifications- notifications will notify you whenever you level up in your social rank, checked in at an event and when you connect with a new user. Do not forget the check your activities once in a while.

Chat- in order to create a new chat, search for the desired user, enter his profile and click on the button next to the profile picture. \nConnect with new people to get social points.\nYou can see all your active chats in the Chat page.

Social Center- in the center, you are able to create your own events, take part in social meetings and help people. When you arrive to an event, remember to have the location and CheckIn button on, to claim the points. We encourage you to help others and socialize more.

Bonus Area- after claiming enough points, diversed benefits can be redeemed using social credits.
Social levels are as follows:
	Shay Socializer: 0-199 points
	Out Of The Shell Socializer: 200-799 points
	Academic Socializer: 800-2599 points 
	Socialized Ninja Turtle: 2600-5999 points
	Socialosaurus: 6000+ points
